resources.string: Give a fresh new look to your phone by using different color combos! Turn your favourite apps to black with the accent of your choice! Victory currently supports 85+ apps and 20+ accents.

You need the Substratum theme engine if you want to apply the theme. You can download it from the Play Store and depending on the operating system you are using you will need to download a paid add-on.
First of all make sure you have read the description of the app on the Play Store and have watched the video available on it. For any questions you can send me an email under contact me in the menu.

Thank you for buying the app. If you like it don't forget to leave a review!

Version: 15.0 Stable
Made with ❤️ from Italy
Substratum is not currently installed on your phone.

Q: App X is force closing
A: Uninstall and install again the overlay!

Q: Res folder doesn't exist error
A: Select your Android version in the top menu when you have opened the theme in Substratum.

Q: Telegram theme doesn't apply
A: Download telegram theme from my support group.
You will need to uninstall and install again the app for showing it in launcher. Do you want to hide it?
